name: Leave your problems at the door
name_original: Leave your problems at the door
description:
Game made for the 2019 Global Game Jam.

Your home is a sanctuary of peace and quiet, but every day life can be problematic.
Protect your home from work related problems, debts and disease, by solving in the only  way they can be solved... by slapping them!

Controls:
ARROWS to MOVE
SPACE to SLAP
